Recurrent Adult Hodgkin Lymphoma
							                    Treatment of recurrent Hodgkin lymphoma may include the following:         -  Combination chemotherapy.     - Combination chemotherapy followed by high-dose chemotherapy and stem cell transplant with or without radiation therapy.     - Combination chemotherapy with radiation therapy to parts of the body with cancer in patients older than 60 years.    - Radiation therapy with or without chemotherapy.    - Chem
